overview: Forrest Taft is an environmental agent who works for the Aegis Oil Company in Alaska. Aegis Oil's corrupt CEO is the kind of person who doesn't care whether or not oil spills into the ocean or onto the landâ€”just as long as it's making money for him.
tagline: His battle to save the Alaskan wilderness and protect its people can only be won...
title: On Deadly Ground
